%HERO_ATLAS%.lore:
Born from foreign parents migrated from very far in the land of the emperor, he experienced the dark times of war waging with near populations who wished to overturn the kingdom. Once grown enough he decided to join the emperor's cause and the army, getting recognized as a valid soldier, and given the opportunity to be in the emperor's guard.

In an extreme contented attack by allied forces he fought with all he had ending in him losing a limb to the poisoned blade of an enemy elite assassin , but managing to save the very life of the emperor.

For his endeavors he was then granted a magical stone gifted by the god of the depths to the emperor: the stone was imbued with the energy coming from the center of the earth, where the god dwells. But the hero of the kingdom still wished to fight: so he was built an artificial limb powered by the magic stone.

He then became Atlas, grand commander of the emperor's army.

%HERO_FORSAKEN_DRUID%.lore:
A long time ago, new caste of magic users were born in the Land of Light. Greatly gifted and often wise beyond their years, through decades of study in nature they were able to combine light and earth magic into what they called life magic.

These scholars of Audinburgh were finally accepted into the circle as the first druids. They were also the first to consistently combine two elements successfully without side effects, and paved a way for new theories and discoveries in magic and its behavior.
